description: Mistress Betka tests the limits of newbie Caroline Pierce, a self-proclaimed pain slut with a high tolerance for abuse. However, while Caroline was experienced in bondage and corporal she had never experimented with electricity. Mistress Betka reveals that in terms of electro Caroline's tolerance isn't as high as she thought! Nevertheless, she toughs it out, has lots of orgasms, and really enjoys her shoot!
title: Caroline Pierce and Betka Schpitz
